name: Plutus Doll:Infinite Fun
description:
It's funny time! Do you like to play free doll shooting games? You are in the right place now!

Just aim and click on the doll in order to shoot them to get the corresponding gold coins or prize.
When you accumulate enough gold coins, you can get the mystery gift.

- Daily Bonus
- Dozens of adorable characters and dolls
- Super boosters and powerful combos

Fun is at the tip of your fingers with the most fascinating doll!
Now you can play the free amazing doll machine game on your mobile phone.
